name: lookup
summary: Find features at or near coordinates
description:
The lookup command performs reverse geocoding - finding what features exist at or near given coordinates. It:

- Searches nodes and ways within radius
- Calculates distance to each feature
- Returns sorted results (nearest first)

Useful for identifying locations on a map.

options.-t, --type: Element type: nodes, ways, all (default: all)

output:
Feature list sorted by distance:
- Feature type (node/way)
- Name and description
- Distance in meters
- Coordinates
- All tags
